# 인천공항 4㎞ 떨어진 주차대행 접수대…보도블럭도, 셔틀도 없다 - 한겨레

[원문 링크](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMiY0FVX3lxTE5sWHBhbTZ0eTZySnVWM1hLQXQyTTVoWkszelhOa3dzcUdtelRWanBtUzMtWWp1eGhacnRvX20waDJ0OXJxcVAxLWQyVlFUeFBmaUFtZFJkdUpvXy1zYWFpNFQtbw?oc=5)
